TopicTitle: [minor issue] Recovering debris from the tracking station and entities counter

Articles.Content: very minor details thingy, the debris counter (not sure if it's also true for some other entities ) only update after leaving then reentering the tracking station instead of being decremented each time you click the recover button.
I've had this issue as well. Exiting the game and re-entering will allow craft/Kerbals to be recovered as well.
